pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw: Can we log QT_ENV as well in `__main__.py`? I know we should be able to infer it from the version string, but let's log it just to be safe (and also this makes it forward compatible if PySide suddenly ramps up version numbers or something so they aren't distinct from PyQt)
content.html: Can we log QT_ENV as well in __main__.py? I know we should be able to infer it from the version string, but let's log it just to be safe (and also this makes it forward compatible if PySide suddenly ramps up version numbers or something so they aren't distinct from PyQt)
